English: In a forest
The bay
Hey, you! Soviet! Put the gun down or we shoot to kill!
Didn't you hear?! Comply or die!
All right, we take him to the others.\nWe go to the forest. You go between us. You make a sudden move, you die. Let's go.
Where did you find this one?
By the shoreline. He was alone.
What about the others?
There are bodies by the road. His unit didn't get past the front in time it seems.
What are we supposed to do with him?
You brought him here. You should answer that question.
I.. didn't think that far. But any information about the enemy will be useful.
Doubtful he has anything interesting to give us.\nHis army just retreated to their island, defeated after their debacle at Montignac.
I would take his gear and gun and leave him for the Americans. Let them do with him what they please.
I like his boots.
I'm taking the gun!
I very much like those boots and my gun, good men. Don't we have a common enemy? Can't we negotiate?
He speaks French!
I noticed, Pierre.\nWell, well, this is surprising then. If you've understood everything then you know what awaits you if you do not cooperate.
Of course I'll cooperate. We are allies after all, right?
Ha ha ha.
Good one.
No, we are very far from allies. Your kind has attacked us once before. We didn't forget and we didn't forgive.\nYou should be glad we didn't shoot you on sight. What is your name?
Private Sergey Rashiv, Soviet Army. We were retreating from the island but were ambushed. I alone survived.
Seeing your comrades die in front of you is never easy. And you did get through the enemy lines... quite resourceful, aren't you?
I think you can be useful.\nAs I see it, we basically saved your life since you wouldn't survive much longer on your own. That means you now help us.
Well, I thank you for your offer though I'd rather get back to that bay where you found me and wait for the ships to come back.
Your army is not coming back, they're on their way to Kolguyev by now. Your only choice is either the Americans or us.
Very well, I see your point. In that case, I'd be glad to help you.
Splendid. Pierre, brief him on the way. Everyone, get ready and let's go.
Listen up, boys. Our goal is the small base behind this forest.\nLoads of Soviet equipment were left there and the Americans guard it lightly.
We go in quickly, load whatever we can on trucks, then leave by the road and hide in the hills to the east.
Let's go!
RAVEN TO NIGHTINGALE. HOW'S IT GOING, JEAN? WHAT'S THE STATUS? OVER.
NIGHTINGALE HEARS YOU, RAVEN. MOST OF THE ENEMY TROOPS ARE IN THE SOUTH. THE ROAD IS CALM. WE HAVE A GOOD OPENING. REPORT WHEN YOU'RE DONE. OUT.
WE'RE APPROACHING THE BASE NOW. GET READY!
GOOD WORK, WE'RE DONE. THEY DIDN'T EVEN MANAGE TO UNLOAD THE SOVIET TRUCKS. MAKES IT EASIER FOR US. GET IN EVERYONE, WE SHOULD BE GETTING OUT QUICKLY!
RAVEN TO NIGHTINGALE, WE'RE LEAVING THE BASE IN TRUCKS. OVER.
BEWARE RAVEN, ENEMY PATROLS IN LEVIE. WE ARE DEPLOYING SMOKES TO COVER YOU. HEAD TO THE SECOND JUNCTION PER PLAN, STILL NOTHING FROM THE SOUTH. OUT.
NIGHTINGALE TO RAVEN, ENEMY TRUCKS COMING AFTER YOU. NORTH AND SOUTH, CLOSE. TAKE CARE OF THEM, THEN RETREAT TO THE HILLS. OUT.
AMMO TRUCKS CONTINUE ON, WE'LL COVER YOU!
WE'VE DONE ENOUGH. RETREAT TO THE HILLS, EVERYONE!
Take Over the Base
Hide in the Hills
Traverse the Forest
Cover the trucks
Nightingale
Raven
